title: Ep 61: Talk It Out with Nicole Byer
itunes:title: Ep 61: Talk It Out with Nicole Byer
itunes:subtitle: This week, Doree makes a playlist for labor and delivery and shares her new favorite TV show, and Kate discusses her negative thought spirals and heads back to therapy. Plus, they finally discover that Gmail does have folders!Then they welcome Nicole ...
description:
This week, Doree makes a playlist for labor and delivery and shares her new favorite TV show, and Kate discusses her negative thought spirals and heads back to therapy. Plus, they finally discover that Gmail does have folders!

Then they welcome Nicole Byer — actress, comedian, podcaster, and host of Netflix’s Nailed It! She chats about dating and communicating sexual desires to a partner, pole dancing class as self-care, being diagnosed with ADD as an adult, and why she embraced fat jokes in her stand up special.

Follow us on Instagram: @Forever35podcast,@katespencer,@doree, Twitter:@forever35pod, and in ourFacebook group(password is "serums"). All products mentioned on the show can be found on our website,Forever35podcast.com. To leave us a voicemail, call 781-591-0390, or you can email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

  • HelloFresh - Get $60 off your first month! Visit hellofresh.com/forever60 and use promo code forever60.
